Based on your preferences, I would recommend checking out the movie "Freeheld". It is a 2015 drama film directed by Jonathan Caouette, based on the novel of the same name written by Matt Greenhalgh.
The movie tells the story of Laurel Hester and Stacie Andree, two New Jersey police lieutenants who fall in love with each other. However, their relationship is threatened when Hester is diagnosed with terminal cancer.
The movie features an impressive cast including actors such as Josh Charles, Steve Carell, Luke Grimes, Mia Wasikowska, Hayley Atwell, Jane Adams, Rufus Sewell, Charlotte Rampling.
Overall, "Freeheld" is a heart-wrenching drama film that tells the story of two police lieutenants who fall in love with each other. However, their relationship is threatened when one of them is diagnosed with terminal cancer.
I hope this recommendation helps you find the perfect movie to enjoy!
